name: The Black Forest (UnknownDev1)
description:
The Black Forest is an extremely large forest that is sacred. Haunted by dangerous entities. Many people come to visit this beautiful forest, not all survive. Those who do have dark stories to tell.

This was my first horror game and it was kinda rushed so it is not made well clearly. My next one is gonna be better as I learned a lot from this project.

If you liked this game and would like to help me out you can donate Cashapp: $UnknownDeveloper
